ernest
Class StaticSystem

java.lang.Object
  ernest.StaticSystem

public class StaticSystem
extends java.lang.Object

Ernest's static system contains all the landmarks ever created. It offers methods to record and refresh new landmarks.

Author:
ogeorgeon

addStimulation

public IStimulation addStimulation(int red,
                                   int green,
                                   int blue,
                                   int distance)
Add a stimulation to static memory if it does not already exist

Parameters:
red - Component of the landmark's color
green - Component of the landmark's color
blue - Component of the landmark's color
distance - The distance of the stimulation (or intensity)
Returns:
the new stimulation if created or the already existing landmark

adjust

public IObservation adjust(IStimulation[] visualCortex,
                           IStimulation[][] tactileCortex,
                           IStimulation kinematicStimulation,
                           IStimulation gustatoryStimulation)
Update the current Observation based on the anticipated observation and on to the sensory stimulations.

Parameters:
visualCortex - The set of visual stimulations in the visual cortex.
tactileCortex - The set of tactile stimulations in the tactile cortex.
kinematicStimulation - The kinematic stimulation.
gustatoryStimulation - The gustatory stimulation.
Returns:
A pointer to the current observation that has been updated.

anticipate

public IObservation anticipate(IAct act)
Generate the anticipated observation from the previous observation and the current intention.

Parameters:
schema - The schema whose effects we want to anticipate.
Returns:
A pointer to the anticipated observation.
